title: Purchase In-Flight Wi-Fi
description: A passenger on a flight wants to purchase a Wi-Fi pass for the duration of the flight.

tasks.description: Identify the passenger's flight details (flight number, seat number).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the passenger's identity and location on the aircraft.

tasks.description: Present the available Wi-Fi pass options and their prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent offers a '1-Hour Pass' and a 'Full Flight Pass'.

tasks.description: Process the payment for the selected 'Full Flight Pass' and provide access instructions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sells the pass and guides the user on how to connect.
